biography: A few days after getting married, he joined the Vermont Volunteers during the Civil War and fought at Gettysburg. Was sick with typhoid fever after the war, then went to medical training. Was a country doctor in Vermont.
miscellaneous: Occupation: Medical Doctor (country doctor in Vermont). Carroll Nelson Culver was named after him. Civil War veteran - Vermont Volunteers, fought at Gettysburg.
